item.description:
"Seventeenth-Century Saturday"
When: The first Saturday of October, 11 a.m. - 3 p.m.
Where: The Coffin House, The Spencer-Peirce-Little Farm and The Swett-Ilsley House in Newbury, MA
Phone: 978-462-2634
Admission: free to Historic New England members, $5 non-members

Seventeenth-Century Saturdays highlights some of the oldest buildings in Essex County, Massachusetts. Visitors may explore Historic New England properties to learn about architectural details often associated with First Period buildings (like timber frame construction and central chimneys), discover how the houses evolved, and find out why these homes were saved and are so significant today. Presented with North of Boston Convention and Visitors Bureau and Essex National Heritage Commission.
item.name: Essex National Heritage Tour
